review: Great  conclusion to the series,Great value. Lots of steam trading cards. Great real time strategy which has both good skirmishes, interesting civilisations and a huge campaign. Complete collection give you more than the basic allowing you to play as asian countries and native american tribes. Great for new and old strategy players.
Really great game.Takes a while to get started but once you get going its one of the best games ever. The variety of heros and the endless combos makes the game worthwhile. Plus its FREE!
